original_title: 日常的に犯す目的で結婚された美人妻 初夜からはじまるレ●プストーリー 葵つかさ
overview: Tsukasa Aoi just got married to who she thoughts to be her ideal man, and they move together to a big house, where they will begin their new happy life.  In this movie, the ending and the beginning are cut and swapped as if it was a Tarantino movie… probably an unnecessary over-complication for a JAV movie(?).  The plot started really nice but didn’t have much development afterwards. However, Tsukasa Aoi did work beautifully and delivered big time in the sex scenes, especially in the last 3P scene her facial expressions are really good. Not to mention, those white jeans…
title: A Beautiful Wife Whose Husband Married Her So He Could Fuck Her On A Daily Basis. The Story Of Disgrace That Begins On Their Wedding Night. Tsukasa Aoi
